response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, craftsmanship, and possibly historical significance. I understand that the true value of such an item may be subjective and deeply personal to each individual. Therefore, I propose to offer this product to you at a price of $650,000. This amount reflects my desire to share this treasure with someone who appreciates its qualities and can potentially cherish it as much as I have. I believe this offer presents a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and the financial considerations involved. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring the possibility of making this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 650000}
